'''Key to Some Place in the Institute''' is a [[Quest Item]] that can be obtained after completing {{Quest|Aqueous Tidemarks}} and opening the [[Exquisite Chest]] in [[The Narzissenkreuz Ordo]].

It is used to unlock the entrance in the south-east corner of the [[Institute of Natural Philosophy]], which will grant the {{Achievement|A Study in Sable}}.
